name: space patrol (warpedrealities)
description:
A space shooter made in Unity.

Earth is being invaded by aliens yet again. Due to the strangely ineffective nature of the combined military forces of the world's governments all hope but one is lost.

Piloting an experimental and strangely fragile spacecraft you, whoever you happen to be, are that hope!

Go forth, thwart the alien invasion. Destroy The Terrible Evil of Space.

Features:

Intensely retro action gameplay.

Multitudinous foes.

Bomb and laser weapons to use to destroy the foes!

Three levels!

Three Bosses!

Local High Scores! Challenge your friends, beat them! Show them who is the true Space Ace!
